package.name: PEAR2_VendorCommands
package.summary: Various commands for handling vendor dependencies for your application
package.description:
The VendorCommands plugin for Pyrus operates on the `vendor` directory within your local application directory. To install this plugin use `php pyrus.phar install -p PEAR2_VendorCommands-alpha`
The vendor-update command scans the package.xml file for dependencies and will install them into the local vendor/ directory of your application.
Example: `pyrus vendor-update`
package.notes:
First relase, only vendor-update is available currently.
Package PEAR2_VendorCommands API release notes for version 0.1.0.
